caption:
On this week’s episode of the podcast: Where Should We Begin? 

A couple on the edge.

Their communication is broken. Their pasts still linger. And they’re trapped—in a painful, familiar loop of blame, defensiveness, and attack.

I try to help them notice their patterns of escalation and break the cycle they keep finding themselves in. 

Comment PODCAST and I'll DM You the link to watch on YouTube now!

#WhereShouldWeBegin #EstherPerel #Relationships #CouplesTherapy #Podcast
